price: Bundan sonra Allah istədiyinin tövbəsini qəbul edər. Allah Bağışlayandır, Rəhmlidir.
arabic: ثُمَّ يَتُوبُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma yatūbu al-lahu min baʿdi dhālika ʿalā man yashāu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
